visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents months with categories from January to December, and the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes monthly rainfall data. The series uses a custom color of '#008080'. Additional configurations include setting the chart background color to '#f9f9f9', defining margins for better spacing, and enabling the legend with styled text. This setup ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
